title: Portfolio App
description: Angular portfolio with localization, certificates, and CV. Designed with a retrowave aesthetic.

detailedDescription.title: Overview
detailedDescription.content: Portfolio web app created using Angular 20. It showcases projects, certificates, and includes my CV in multiple languages. The site is styled with a retrowave-inspired theme and is fully responsive.

detailedDescription.title: Key Features
detailedDescription.content: Supports internationalization (i18n) with multiple language options, responsive layout for different devices, modular and scalable architecture, and smooth visual transitions.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Stack
detailedDescription.content: Angular 20, TypeScript, SCSS, Angular Router, modern CSS (Flexbox, Grid). Built using Angular best practices for production-ready deployment.

title: Clickoin
description: Clicker game with skins, rare drops, and Steam features. Built in Unity with full gamedev cycle.

detailedDescription.title: Overview
detailedDescription.content: Clickoin is a casual clicker game built with Unity where players earn coins, unlock skins, and receive time-based or achievement-based drops. Features include custom rarity logic, offline-safe drops, and full Steam integration.

detailedDescription.title: Development Process
detailedDescription.content: I worked on game design, programming, and testing. Implemented Steam Cloud, Achievements, Inventory, and secure save encryption. Game loop iterated based on player feedback during playtests.

title: Barcode Scanner
description: Angular-based PWA to scan barcodes via Honeywell Captuvo on iOS using Cordova.

detailedDescription.title: Overview
detailedDescription.content: This PWA was a prototype project created to explore integration between Angular/Ionic and Honeywell Captuvo barcode scanners on iOS using Cordova plugins.

detailedDescription.title: Technical Insights
detailedDescription.content: Implemented basic scanner detection and data retrieval, explored plugin interface options, and tested real-time scanning capabilities with external hardware.
